tool.name: read
tool.description:
Read file contents with line numbers and pagination support.
Features: - Line numbers are displayed for easy reference (format: 00001| content) - Supports offset and limit for reading large files in chunks - Maximum 50KB output per read - Maximum 2000 lines per read (configurable with limit) - Image and PDF files are returned as base64 attachments - Binary files are detected and rejected
For large files, use offset to read subsequent sections.

parameters.parameter: The path to the file to read (absolute or relative to project root)
The line number to start reading from (0-based). Default is 0.
The number of lines to read. Default is 2000.
